pages.text: Kitchen facilities here include counters, stoves, and chimneys. Facilities of several materials are provided to fit in different architecture styles.

Mud-and-drystone ones, which requires dirt and cobblestones only, are cheap enough to be made at very early game. Their function is comparable with facilities of other materials, except that mud-and-drystone stoves are slower to heat.
Stone ones are made of stone bricks and stone slabs â€” note not stone brick slabs.
Brick ones are made of bricks and bricks slabs.
Opus latericium ones are made of opus latericium blocks and its slabs. It looks similar with its brick counterparts, but with exposed concrete.
Opus incertum ones are made of opus incertum blocks and its slabs
